generated_body: In the article titled "17 restaurants that will be open on Thanksgiving," the user can likely expect a comprehensive list of dining options for the holiday, highlighting various establishments that cater to those looking to dine out rather than cook at home. This guide could be particularly useful for readers planning their holiday meals or seeking convenient dining solutions.
